meta.content: dev, pom, repository, component, maven, sonar, jenkins, github, gitlab, rest

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: Lutece tools for integrators and developers

ul.li: Repository of components: List of Lutece components present in the Maven repository, with Github, Gitlab, Jenkins, JIRA, SONAR information ....
Generating a site POM from a list of plugins
Dependency management of a POM: Update to the last stable version of the dependencies of a POM
Managing dependency versions: Generate dependencies from a list of components.
